item.description:
The sun (hopefully), good company, and good food. You can't beat that.

Please keep in mind that this goes on for most of the day, I'll be there from about 11:00 to about 5:00, and if you RSVP yes, you're not expected to show up at any specific time, so don't feel constrained to have to be there by 11:00 and spend the entire day.  But please make a note in your RSVP comment when you might plan on coming.

Details along with a discussion board thread will be added as we get closer so we all know who's bringing what (or perhaps check the comments).

Unfortunately, due to my schedule, there is no rain date, so please do your sun dances now to get the weather gods happy.
item.name: The RI Games & Events Group April 2012 BBQ
